issue.title: [C++] Add ResolveNullOptions to Logical kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would add an enum ResolveNull \{ KLEENE_LOGIC, NULL_PROPAGATE } to define the behavior of merging with AND/OR operators on boolean.
